item.description:
All the nerdy games you can think of - Shadow's over Camelot, Fluxx, Scrabble, Cranium, TriBond, Blokus, Pit, and more. Bring the games you love!!

Starting late afternoon so we can have plenty of time for the longer games. If you can't come until later, that's fine, just mention it in your rsvp.

I'll order some pizzas, but please bring snacks and drinks as gaming can be very exhausting =).

I live in Malden and there is lots of street parking and I'm about a 15min walk from the Malden stop on the Orange Line.

On Friday, I will email all the "yes" RSVPs my address. Sorry if this is inconvenient for anyone, but I don't want my address posted for everyone to see. Thanks and hope you can make it.

There is a RSVP cap, so there will be no maybes allowed, as we need a more accurate head count
item.name: Game Night at Jenny's
